pages.text: $(9)Resistance$() is a fairly useful effect that has no recipe in vanilla.$(p)Each level gives +20% damage reduction against all sources.$(p)You'll also need it to craft $(l:apotheosis:potion/effects/sundering)Sundering$() potions.

pages.title: Brewing Recipe
pages.text: This potion can be crafted with an Awkward Potion and a Shulker Shell.$(p)It can be extended, strengthend, or turned into a splash potion with the usual ingredients.
